outputs.output_descr: This project is intended to support national authorities in elaborating  a national framework on community -based policing that provides for an accountable and closer working partnership between the civilian police and the communities

project_descr: The Community Policing Project is intended to support national authorities in elaborating a national framework on community-based policing that provides for an accountable and closer working partnership between the civilian police and the communities.
